description:
The members of DearDream and KUROFUNE are assigned to a special project in which they capture full coverage of Sankishi. While some of the seven members are awed by the talents and lifestyles of Susa and Saotome, the ones following Mikami witness an unbelievable secret. To protect his secret, Junya leads the others in making a certain promise...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 突撃! 三貴子の秘密!!!
